title: Episode 91: The Wave (Feat. Mack Wilds)
itunes:title: Episode 91: The Wave (Feat. Mack Wilds)
description:
This episode of Lip Service we put Mack Wilds back in the hot seat! Listen as he explains why he chooses to have Sex with the lights on, having no problem filling up a Magnum, masturbating before a date, as well as exactly why he makes a great side piece! Angela Yee, Gigi Maguire, and Lore'l explain what strain a reputation can put on a relationship, having sex under the influence, being married while dating, and the time Gigi found out you can put a dildo in the dishwasher! Be sure to check out Mack Wilds

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
